metadata.title: CVE-2024-28180 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Package jose aims to provide an implementation of the Javascript ObjectSigning and Encryption set of standards. An attacker could send a JWEcontaining compressed data that used large amounts of memory and CPU whendecompressed by Decrypt or DecryptMulti. Those functions now return anerror if the decompressed data would exceed 250kB or 10x the compressedsize (whichever is larger). This vulnerability has been patched in versions4.0.1, 3.0.3 and 2.6.3.

criterions.comment: golang-github-go-jose-go-jose package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
